void log (char *logger, uint8 level, char *ftm,...)

Detailed Description

This class is a loggable.

Any class that needs to log messages in some way can inherit from this class and then invoke the log() method.

void uStreamLib::Loggable::log (  char *  logger,
uint8  level,
char *  ftm,
  ...
) 
 

Log specified message to specified log. If specified logger is not found, default logger will be used. If no logger is set, then output is on standard error.

Log specified message to default log. If no logger is set, then output is on standard error.
